xqdoc:description.p: Render to o/p xqdoc and xqparse XML files

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:xqdoc

xqdoc:annotation.name: xqdoca:module
xqdoc:annotation.xqdoc:literal: xqDoc xml file from the source module

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function _:xqdoc ( $file as map(*), $model as map(*), $opts as map(*) ) { $file?xqdoc }

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:xqparse

xqdoc:annotation.name: xqdoca:module
xqdoc:annotation.xqdoc:literal: xqparse xml file from the source module

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function _:xqparse ( $file as map(*), $model as map(*), $opts as map(*) ) { $file?xqparse }
